name: CyberpunkRPGTrideoShows
0:
”Alexa, open cyberpunk show”
”give me a trideo show”
”what's on the trid”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cyberpunk show
des: Another helpful tool to add flavor to your Cyberpunk genre tabletop RPG session. Every so often you enter a room and the trid is on, or a runner says they are just going to chill and watch the trid. Why not find out what's on? For some extra fun, ask the runner to describe the plot, and tell the other players what their favorite part of the show or movie is?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
